# The `CastIsPossible` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This struct provides a way to check if a given cast is possible. <a href="#details">More...</a>

</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

This struct provides a way to check if a given cast is possible.

It provides a static function called isPossible that is used to check if a cast can be performed. It should be overridden like this:

template&lt;&gt; struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible">CastIsPossible&lt;foo, bar&gt;</a> &#123; static inline bool isPossible(const bar &amp;b) &#123; return bar.isFoo(); &#125; &#125;;

Definition at line 253 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/casting-h">Casting.h</a>.
